text: This page lists the World Best Year Performance in the year 1998 in the men's decathlon. One of the main events during this season were the 1998 European Championships in Budapest, Hungary, where the competition started on August 18, 1998, and ended on August 19, 1998. ==Records== {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center; !colspan="5"|Standing records prior to the 1998 season in track and field |- | World Record || || 8891 || September 5, 1992 || Talence, France |} ==1998
